verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Lord your ways are higher than my mind could ever reach
But still you call me to come and speak with You

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And now I speak straight to the king above all kings
And I know that You are always listening

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
And You hear me
Oh, I know You hear me

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: If you give to me a crown then at Your feet I lay it down
